body:
I am seeing this too on current go tip (devel +824e74b) on linux amd64. For me it reproduces if you create a new clean `$GOPATH` to work in:

    export GOPATH=/tmp/gp-temp
    mkdir $GOPATH
    go get golang.org/x/tools/godoc/analysis
    [original reporter's panic happens]

I have not attempted to git bisect to find the git version that introduces this.
